description: Erection of single-storey extension at ground floor level to provide enclosed canopy to retail unit
decision_conditions: The proposal, by reason of its bulk, scale, design and location, would represent an inappropriate addition to the host building, to the detriment of the visual amenity of the host building and would fail to preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the Brownswood Conservation Area. As such the proposal is contrary to policies D4 (Delivering good Design) and HC1 (Heritage conservation and growth) of the London Plan 2021 and policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) and LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) of the Hackney Local Plan 2020 and the Brownswood Character Appraisal and Management Plan Feb 2020 .
subdivision_of_building: Ground floor commercial unit only. (Class E)
